pkgmetadata.longdescription: # django-strict-fieldsThis library is meant to help enforce stricter rules around using some of the basic model fields that Django provides. View the docs [here](https://django-strict-fields.readthedocs.io) to get started.## Compatibility`django-strict-fields` is compatible with Python 3.8 - 3.12 and Django 3.2 - 5.0.## Documentation[View the django-strict-fields docs here](https://django-strict-fields.readthedocs.io/)## InstallationInstall `django-strict-fields` with: pip3 install django-strict-fieldsAfter this, add `strict_fields` to the `INSTALLED_APPS` setting of your Django project.## Contributing GuideFor information on setting up django-strict-fields for development and contributing changes, view [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md).## Primary Authors* @tomage: Tómas Árni Jónasson
